rows.label: qst103602_msg0001
rows.name: Treat it with care, young lady.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0002
rows.name: Wow! Thank you!

rows.label: qst103602_msg0003
rows.name:
If I make it now, I'll be able to get it
done before he has to go!

rows.label: qst103602_msg0004
rows.name:
Where is your friend going?
To Gula Province, perhaps?

rows.label: qst103602_msg0005
rows.name:
Ah, no.
To Fons Maim.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0006
rows.name:
Fons Maim...
Not many people choose to move to
Invidia...

rows.label: qst103602_msg0007
rows.name:
Him and his dad... They're going to
seek asylum there.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0008
rows.name: Seek asylum?

rows.label: qst103602_msg0009
rows.name:
Well, he won't tell me the details in
case he makes his dad angry.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0010
rows.name:
What kind of person is your friend's
father exactly?

rows.label: qst103602_msg0011
rows.name: Um, I've never met him...

rows.label: qst103602_msg0012
rows.name: Your friend's name, then?

rows.label: qst103602_msg0013
rows.name: Well...uhh...

rows.label: qst103602_msg0014
rows.name:
The way to Fons Maim from the
imperial capital is very difficult.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0015
rows.name:
So we'd like to offer to help them
with moving there, if that's all right.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0016
rows.name: Oh...

rows.label: qst103602_msg0017
rows.name: His name is Mahl Arascain.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0018
rows.name:
If you run into him, don't tell him about
the pendant, OK?

rows.label: qst103602_msg0019
rows.name: We promise.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0020
rows.name:
Have this as a little thank-you!
Bye!

rows.label: qst103602_msg0021
rows.name:
You have a rather harsh way with
children, don't you think, Wadatsumi?

rows.label: qst103602_msg0022
rows.name:
Forgive me. My knowledge of social
mores is unpolished, I know.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0023
rows.name:
You were the same with Nefer
when he was small.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0024
rows.name:
Do you think it was embarrassing for
the boy?

rows.label: qst103602_msg0025
rows.name:
Embarrassing? You used to reduce him
to tears!

rows.label: qst103602_msg0026
rows.name:
Oh, I am a disgrace.
An Emperor's Blade should not
be so foolish!

rows.label: qst103602_msg0027
rows.name:
I must atone.
I must return to my Core Crystal!

rows.label: qst103602_msg0028
rows.name:
Never mind that!
More importantly, doesn't the name
"Arascain" sound familiar?

rows.label: qst103602_msg0101
rows.name: Do you remember?

rows.label: qst103602_msg0102
rows.name: I remember.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0103
rows.name: I can't remember.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0121
rows.name: I expected no less.

rows.label: qst103602_msg0131
rows.name:
Senator Stulc Arascain! The one whose
wife was killed at Sm√πide Hot Spring!

rows.label: qst103602_msg0151
rows.name:
Let's find him, and find out why he
needs to seek asylum!
